name: Transfusion (MangoFish)
description:
SOMETIMES THERE IS A BUG THAT MAKES IT SO YOU CAN'T MOVE. TRY OPENING A NEW TAB TO FIX IT.

Made in 1 out of 3 days for MiniJam 118 Vampires

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

X or SPACE or MOUSE BUTTON to attack

There are 3 levels

Credits

Monogram font by Datagoblin

Modified tileset by 0x72

Music by David KBD
